[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[35m/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/[0m[95mlibc.so.6+0x24082[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mBuildId: [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m5792732f783158c66fb4f3756458ca24e46e827d[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x5619624957ad[0m[39m in _start [0m[1;39m([0m[35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz+0x647ad[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp9qs5xp8f[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhen running the libFuzzer harness against the Mongoose codebase, AddressSanitizer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetects a stack-buffer-overflow in the formatted-output routines. The overflow [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled via `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `scpy` → [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when formatting data—specifically within a local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_vxprintf`. The faulty write is triggered during HTTP parsing in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_http_parse` as exercised by the fuzz target [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  The log identifies a stack-based buffer overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write past the end of a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-allocated buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Failure evidence  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  AddressSanitizer reports a WRITE of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at an address just beyond the end of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `tmp371` array in the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, while `tmp371` occupies only bytes [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[39m of that frame.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Call chain  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c` invokes `mg_http_parse`.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` calls `mg_log` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlog.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which uses `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vsnprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → `mg_snprintf`.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Inside `mg_vxprintf`, `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`scpy` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt to write formatted output, overrunning `tmp371`.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Observations  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow is reliably triggered under the fuzzer’s entropic power schedule [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith a seed input mapped to `[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The local buffer `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdeclared in `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is too small to hold [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcertain formatted strings produced by `mg_dtoa` or related formatting functions.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The sanitizer stack shadows show a redzone immediately following `tmp371`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmarking the invalid write.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas to investigate  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mespecially the definition and use of buffers `tmp`, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`, and the logic around `mg_vxprintf` and `scpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/printf.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vsnprintf`, `mg_snprintf`, and the private I/O[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/log.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhow format strings and arguments are passed into the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprinting routines[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/http.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe parsing routine invoking logging and [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA comprehensive review of the buffer allocations and bounds checking in the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprintf/fmt modules will be required to understand the full scope of this overflow.[0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp9qs5xp8f[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Analysis [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Analysis Report[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Relevant Code Snippets[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m146[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`, inside `mg_vxprintf`’s `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch, a local buffer of [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately afterward, the code calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpassing a `dstlen` of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m into a buffer that can only hold [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplus a null [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, leading to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer overflow.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical Logic to Preserve[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The formatting semantics of `%e` and `%E`, namely:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Generating an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-digit fractional mantissa via `mg_dtoa`.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Emitting the format character [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`e` or `E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Printing the signed exponent via `mg_lld`.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The existing code’s use of `scpy` and the surrounding I/O buffer logic must [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain intact so as not to break other formatted-output paths.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Enlarge and parameterize the mantissa buffer to match its use:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace the fixed-size `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` with a larger buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `char [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m so it can safely hold:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        • Mantissa digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to width digits plus integer digit and decimal point[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        • A null terminator for `mg_dtoa`’s internal needs.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change the call to `mg_dtoa` to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` rather than the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhard-coded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`, ensuring any future buffer-size changes stay in sync:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Before [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsafe[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m After [0m[1;39m([0m[39msafe[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Rationale[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` guarantees that the `dstlen` passed into `mg_dtoa` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnever exceeds the actual buffer size.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Enlarging the buffer to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bytes provides ample room for the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigit, decimal point, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m fractional digits = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m chars[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plus the null terminator, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout significantly impacting stack usage.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This change is local to the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch; no other formatting paths are[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffected.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. No Other Modifications[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Do not alter harness or fuzzing logic.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Do not modify external libraries, test code, or unrelated utility [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Existing logging, parsing, and printing behavior remains unchanged except [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat it is now safe under AddressSanitizer.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Open `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch within `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m317[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Change:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[33m...[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      to:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[33m...[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Rebuild and run the libFuzzer harness under AddressSanitizer to confirm the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow is resolved.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Run the full test suite to verify no regressions in formatted-output [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side-Effects & Mitigations[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage in `mg_vxprintf` grows by [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes—negligible for modern systems.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Formatting logic and output remain identical, since `mg_dtoa`’s behavior is [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill governed by the `width` parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and not by the buffer size, as long as [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer is sufficiently large.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, future buffer-size adjustments will automatically [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpropagate to the `dstlen` argument, preventing similar bugs.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This targeted fix directly addresses the off-by-one/mismatched-length misuse [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat AddressSanitizer flagged.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It preserves all existing formatting semantics and harness integration.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It enforces bounds safety without introducing broad exception catching or [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mextensive refactoring.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe codebase under test crashes with an AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe formatting routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_vxprintf → scpy → mg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The initial [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missue log shows a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow writing past a small temporary buffer in fmt.c [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen handling the ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m‘E’ conversion specifier. A patch was attempted in src/fmt.c:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe local buffer `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` was enlarged to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and the call to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` was updated from a hard-coded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` length parameter to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter rebuilding and re-running the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs, the crash still occurs at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same stack offset in the same code paths, indicating the overflow remains.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Crash Type: AddressSanitizer reports a stack-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Location: mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39min printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, called by scpy in fmt.c, during [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call Stack Highlights:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • mg_pfn_iobuf_private → mg_putchar_iobuf_static → scpy → mg_vxprintf → [0m       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Buffer Details: In the frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m there are two stack [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobjects:  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan indicates the overflow writes at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just past `tmp371`.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File Modified: src/fmt.c  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Hunk Around Line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m:  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```diff[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Intent: Increase local buffer size and pass its actual length to the dtoa [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroutine, hoping to prevent overflow.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Result After Patch  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzer run again with the same settings [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Crash still occurs at exactly the same stack address and call stack.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan log identifies the same overflow in scpy called from mg_vxprintf; the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer overflow persists.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Further Investigation  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack overflow remains in the formatting path for exponent formatting [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, suggesting either:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The enlarged `tmp` is still not large enough for certain inputs or [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting parameters.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • There is another temporary buffer in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malso overflows.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Files & Functions to examine:  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • fmt.c: full implementation of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mobject layouts, use of other [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers such as `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • fmt.c: `mg_dtoa` implementation and its assumptions on buffer length vs. [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequested output length  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • printf.c: the scpy routine and its use of `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • log.c and http.c: contexts in which formatted strings are generated and [0m     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m215[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/printf.[0m[1;92mc:26[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m39[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar ch, void *param, bool expand[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf *io = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_iobuf *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m param;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpand && io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m <= io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:    io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ch;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:    io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len < io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:    io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Guarantee to [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m-terminate[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmg_putchar_iobuf_static[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar ch, void *param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m([0m[39mch, param, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, there are two local buffers:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m An outer buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcompiler-reported as `tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sized [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m An inner buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, compiler-reported as `tmp371`, offset [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The inner [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer is shadowing the outer [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer. It is used for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboth:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Formatting the mantissa via `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Formatting the exponent via `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` can each generate up to tens of characters:  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – `mg_dtoa` may produce up to [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdigit[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdecimal[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprecision[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptional sign ≈ [0m[1;36m11[0m[39m chars.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – `mg_lld` can emit up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m chars for a [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m-bit integer, though for double [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponents it’s around [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m chars.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer overflows, causing ASan-reported stack-buffer-overflow. [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEnlarging it to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m was still too small for `mg_dtoa`.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte outer buffer was introduced earlier in `mg_vxprintf` to hold [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnumeric conversions safely [0m[1;39m([0m[39mused by other branches, e.g., `%d`, `%u`, `%x`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The inner `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` shadowing is unnecessary: we can reuse the outer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This change leaves all fuzzer harnesses, logging, and other formatting [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranches untouched.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Strategy[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Remove the inner, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer declaration in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` case, perform both the mantissa and exponent formatting into[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe existing outer buffer:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Pass the outer buffer’s actual size as `dstlen` to `mg_dtoa`.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Call `mg_lld` onto the same outer buffer.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Ensure `scpy` and `out` calls use that buffer.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m No changes to harness or fuzzer logic; no changes to tests.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Step-by-Step Implementation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch beginning at the line reported [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m~[0m[1;36m317[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Delete the line declaring `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Replace subsequent uses of the inner `tmp` with the outer buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlikely named `buf` or `tmp` at the top of `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – If the outer buffer is named `tmp`, it can be reused directly.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Otherwise, rename or alias the outer buffer to `tmp` in this branch.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Change the call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Leave the call `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` unchanged, now safe because[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp` is the larger buffer.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Why This Works[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By removing the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte shadow buffer, we eliminate the small buffer entirely. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe code falls back to using the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer already designed for numeric [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconversions.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` both have enough headroom in a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte array to avoid [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We do not alter any public APIs, harness code, or test code. All existing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting functionality is preserved.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Possible Side Effects & Mitigations[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Slight increase in stack usage for this branch is negligible [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwe’re reusing an[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If the outer buffer were ever smaller than [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, that would need [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustment—but ASan logs confirm it is [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No performance impact: same memory region is used, same number of calls.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. References[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar reuse of the outer `tmp` buffer occurs in the `%d`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%u` branches [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately preceding the `%e` branch.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan reports “tmp” at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, confirming adequacy.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<FilePatch>[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--- a/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+++ b/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m11[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reuse outer tmp buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-325[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m322[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* print exponent digits into same buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[33m...[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mFilePatch[0m[39m>[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
