[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer run on the codebase triggered an AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the formatting routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_vxprintf → scpy → mg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The patch [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt modified the `mg_dtoa` call in `src/fmt.c` to pass the actual buffer size [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of a hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`, and removed the explicit `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeclaration. After applying this change, the same stack-buffer-overflow crash [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecurred at the same location and offset, indicating the patch did not resolve the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderlying buffer overflow.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer log reports an ASan stack-buffer-overflow in function [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/printf.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, invoked by `scpy` in `src/fmt.c`.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash occurs during format string processing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen handling the `%e` or `%E` specifier.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan identifies an out-of-bounds write of [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof `mg_vxprintf` where two local arrays live:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m — the overflow target.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens because the code writes beyond the end of `tmp371` when [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopying the digits produced by `mg_dtoa`.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant Observations  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The write site is inside `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, buffer, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `mg_dtoa` is generating more characters than the receiving buffer can hold.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The array named `tmp371` in the stack frame is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes long but is being [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtreated as if it could hold more.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `src/fmt.c`, at the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handling branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39moriginally around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Removed the hardcoded literal size parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the call  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Changed it to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m== [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The explicit declaration `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` was deleted [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpatch context omitted it[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This edit intended to synchronize the buffer capacity and the size passed to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Running the fuzzer after this change reproduces the same AddressSanitizer error [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the identical code path and same offset.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack-buffer-overflow remains in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` during output of the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted number.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan log still points to an overflow of the local `tmp371` array in [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and size of the local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`, `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The parameters and potential return values of `mg_dtoa`, including its maximum [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput length versus the provided buffer size.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `scpy` and how it handles buffer length and writes via [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between `mg_vxprintf`, `mg_snprintf`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_vsnprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand the i/o buffer functions.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any other format-specifier handling branches that use similar temporary buffers.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> %g %g [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, d, t, n, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn + s++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" 1--> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!tz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m targ_width = width + n;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m; s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && n < targ_width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:      buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Investigate and patch the output‐buffer writer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Root Cause: All formatted output goes through [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout,param,…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which calls [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_putchar_iobuf_static → mg_pfn_iobuf_private. Currently mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites unconditionally to the user‐supplied buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mon the stack in [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vsnprintf/mg_snprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so if the formatter [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. %e[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m asks for more bytes than [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe caller’s buffer length, an overflow occurs.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Fix: Change mg_pfn_iobuf_private in src/printf.c to bound all writes by the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39miobuf’s declared size. For example:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       static void [0m[1;35mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c, struct mg_iobuf *io[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m ensure room for at least one [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmore character[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m c;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m else: drop the character [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtruncate[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but do not write out of bounds[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Effect: Regardless of how many bytes scpy attempts, the write will stop at [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer capacity, preventing any stack‐buffer‐overflow in the iobuf.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Clean up the %e/%E formatting branch in src/fmt.c to avoid mismatched temp [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Remove the shadowed “char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m” that led to two distinct “tmp” arrays [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, one [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and confusion over [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Reuse the single temp buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, already declared at the top of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for both the mantissa and exponent parts.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Always pass the real buffer capacity to mg_dtoa and mg_lld. For example:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, pr_used, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc,param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, exponent_width, exponent_flags[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Ensure that “pr_used” is the parsed precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m if specified, or defaults [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m per C standard, rather than the hardcoded [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Respect the parsed precision field and C defaults:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – In the same branch, replace the hardcoded “[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m” passed to mg_dtoa with “pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m”.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – This both reduces maximum possible output length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthereby bounding the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mworst‐case scpy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and conforms to the standard behavior for “%e” [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdefault precision [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Regression‐proof the formatting code:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – After these changes, run the full test suite, including the fuzz harness, to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure no regressions.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The addition of the bounds‐check in mg_pfn_iobuf_private is safe for all [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting format specifiers and will simply truncate any over‐long output rather [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan corrupt memory.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The cleanup in the %e branch preserves all intended logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa + ‘e’ + [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m while eliminating the overflow hazard.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Patching mg_pfn_iobuf_private is the most robust way to guard against any future [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscpy misuse or format branch that might exceed the user buffer.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Cleaning up the %e branch removes the accidental shadow of a smaller buffer and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensures that the single, correctly sized temp buffer is used throughout.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Honoring the parsed precision helps keep output length within known bounds [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdefault [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m → max ~[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m chars for %e[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, preventing pathological overflows.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– No harness or external libraries are modified; existing public APIs [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_snprintf,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vsnprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m retain their behavior except that outputs longer than the buffer are [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnow silently truncated instead of overrunning.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– This approach is consistent with how other format specifiers are protected [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthey [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready rely on mg_pfn_iobuf_private for bounds checking[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential Side‐Effects & Mitigations:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Truncation: Very long formatted strings will now be silently truncated. This [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmatches standard snprintf behavior [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit always respects the buffer length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Logging functions: mg_log or other callers expecting full output may see [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated messages; if that is a concern, callers should use a larger buffer.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– No change to scpy or harness; the fuzzer will still trigger faults if there are [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother bugs, but this stack‐buffer‐overflow will be eliminated.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReferences:  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Similar bounds‐checks are used in the iobuf logic for streaming sockets [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmg_pfn_iobuf grows buffer dynamically or checks lengths[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Standard C snprintf always respects the size parameter; our change brings [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmongoose’s printf routines into compliance.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:33:38][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=934625;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=80552;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:34:47][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.ANALYZE -> TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m                     ]8;id=465617;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=163529;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:35:25][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=293000;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=912439;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                       ]8;id=728097;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=19247;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Took [1;36m0.48[0m seconds;              ]8;id=807552;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=575960;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp9qs5xp8f[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a one‐byte stack‐buffer overflow detected by AddressSanitizer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring fuzzing. The overflow originates in the function mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msrc/printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when writing into an I/O buffer driven by a temporary stack array in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A patch was attempted in two places:  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Adjusting the buffer‐resize and bounds checks in mg_pfn_iobuf_private to avoid [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites past the end of the buffer.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Changing the local temporary array handling in mg_vxprintf for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat specifier: removing a fixed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` declaration, passing the proper [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize to mg_dtoa, and refining precision logic.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same stack‐buffer overflow is still triggered in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private, with AddressSanitizer pointing again at an overflow into the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecond temporary array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m on the stack.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzz test [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exercises the HTTP parser [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_http_parse[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich invokes mg_log, then mg_vxprintf, then mg_pfn_iobuf_private via scpy.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reports a WRITE of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m to an address just beyond a [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack‐allocated array in the frame of mg_vxprintf.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash stack trace:  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m writes to io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • scpy [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls the output function repeatedly  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m triggers formatting for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow target is a local array named ‘tmp371’ at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In src/printf.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Wrapped the resize call in its own conditional  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed the bounds check from `io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m <= io->size` to `io->len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mio->size`  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Standardized zero‐termination to `[0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In src/fmt.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_vxprintf, around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Commented out or removed a fixed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` declaration for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Passed `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of literal `[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` to mg_dtoa  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Made the precision parameter dynamic [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Left the rest of the formatting logic and other branches intact  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzing was rerun under AddressSanitizer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m iterations.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same one‐byte stack‐buffer‐overflow occurs at the same code location [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, again writing past a local temporary buffer in mg_vxprintf.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack frame still contains two objects: `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow hits the byte immediately after `tmp371`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The size and lifetime of the temporary arrays in mg_vxprintf, especially [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`, and whether their fixed sizes are sufficient for all formatting cases.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of mg_vxprintf: data written by mg_dtoa and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_lld may exceed the array bounds.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction between scpy, mg_pfn_iobuf_private and buffer sizing: ensure that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe I/O buffer `io->size` is correctly computed before writes.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementations of mg_dtoa and mg_lld: verify that they never produce output [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger than the supplied buffer.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Overall formatting engine assumptions on maximum output length versus actual [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtemporary buffer allocations.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:size_t [0m[1;35mmg_print_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *arg, va_list *ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:  uint16_t *p = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, uint16_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mprint_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:size_t [0m[1;35mmg_print_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *arg, va_list *ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:  struct mg_addr *addr = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, struct mg_addr *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39maddr->is_ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mprint_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, arg, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m addr->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mprint_ip4[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, arg, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &addr->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:size_t [0m[1;35mmg_print_ip_port[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *arg, va_list *ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  struct mg_addr *a = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, struct mg_addr *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_xprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, arg, [0m[32m"%M:%hu"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip, a, [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma->port[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:size_t [0m[1;35mmg_print_mac[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *arg, va_list *ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:  uint8_t *p = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, uint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_xprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, arg, [0m[32m"%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x"[0m[39m, p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m,[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:                    p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:static char [0m[1;35mmg_esc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c, bool esc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:  const char *p, *esc1 = [0m[32m"\b\f\n\r\t\\\""[0m[39m, *esc2 = [0m[32m"bfnrt\\\""[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root‐cause analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte overflow not in the I/O buffer but in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe small local array `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39malias `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Both `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` can produce more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m characters:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, dstlen, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` was called with `[0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` but may generate sign +[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigit + “.” + precision digits + `[0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to ~[0m[1;36m11[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can produce multi-digit exponents [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Consequently, writing past `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` corrupts the stack frame, and the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msanitizer blame falls back to the generic `scpy → mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, but the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreal overflow is in `mg_vxprintf`’s local buffer.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical logic to preserve[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing formatting behavior for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` must remain unchanged: [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa, exponent, precision, alternate‐form flag, width/padding.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The I/O buffer resizing logic in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` may be reused from the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlast patch; it does not itself overflow the I/O buffer but protects it.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch steps[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In src/fmt.c, enlarge the temporary buffer in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Replace `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` with `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       Rationale: `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is already used safely for other format conversions in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same function, and [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes are ample to hold mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + digits + up to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m–precision fraction + null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m digits + null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Update the two calls to formatting functions:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno size parameter for `mg_lld`, but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfitting into [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes is safe[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Reapply [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand slightly tidy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m the previous patch to `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/printf.c to ensure its bounds-checking is robust:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - If `expand` is requested and `len+[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > size`, resize to at least `len+[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Change write condition from `len+[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m <= size` to `len+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < size` to guarantee [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroom for the character and the terminating null.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Patch outline [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno harness or tests modified[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   --- src/fmt.c[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     @@ [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* enlarged to match worst-case mj_dtoa/mg_lld output *[0m[35m/[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n++;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     …[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   --- src/printf.c[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     @@ static void [0m[1;35mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar ch, void *param, bool expand[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    struct mg_iobuf *io = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_iobuf *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m param;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpand && io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m <= io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ch;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len < io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Guarantee to [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m-terminate[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    struct mg_iobuf *io = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_iobuf *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m param;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure space for ch + [0m[32m'\\0'[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpand && io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Write one character if there is room for ch and terminating [0m[32m'\\0'[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ch;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->len < io->size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Just zero-terminate if only room for [0m[32m'\\0'[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Enlarging `tmp` to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes removes the stack overflow; this size is already [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproven safe elsewhere in the formatting function.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` aligns the destination length parameter to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe actual buffer size.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other logic in `mg_vxprintf` is altered—mantissa, exponent, precision, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwidth, padding, and output order remain unchanged.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The I/O buffer patch remains in place to prevent any off-by-one writes in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`; this is independent of the local buffer overflow.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to harness code or external utilities; existing tests and fuzz [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharnesses will continue to operate unchanged.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage increases by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in `mg_vxprintf`, which is negligible and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macceptable.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Validation[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and run the fuzzer under AddressSanitizer for >[0m[1;36m1000[0m[39m iterations to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure no further stack‐buffer‐overflows.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests for `printf` and HTTP logging to confirm no behavioral[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregressions.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, add a targeted unit test for `%e` formatting with very large [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponents and high precision to validate buffer safety.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose codebase. The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile writing formatted output generated by `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. In [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparticular, a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overruns a stack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocated in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`. The patch attempt tightened the bounds checks in [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, enlarged a local buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes in the `%e/%E` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler of `mg_vxprintf`, and adjusted calls to `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to use the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnew buffer size and conditional precision. Despite these changes, the same overflow[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis still reported at the same code locations.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer invocation: `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m` under AddressSanitizer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mflagged a crash.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Error report:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `AddressSanitizer: stack-buffer-overflow` at `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Backtrace leads through `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `scpy` → `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - In `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m there is a local buffer labeled `tmp371` covering [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but a write is performed at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, overflowing the buffer.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Frames of interest:  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
