[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In printf.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Added explicit checks to ensure there is room for the character plus [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminating `[0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Changed the conditional logic to only write the character if `io->len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mio->size`, and to zero-terminate when only one byte remains.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In fmt.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwithin the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Enlarged the temporary buffer `tmp` from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Updated `mg_dtoa` calls to pass `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of a hard-coded length, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand use `pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m` for precision.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Left the exponent formatting via `mg_lld` unchanged.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult After Patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same fuzzer command produces an identical AddressSanitizer report:  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Crash in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` at the same buffer offset.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The backtrace and stack-frame layout remain the same, pointing again to an [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow of the stack buffer in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Buffer allocations and bounds checks within `mg_vxprintf`, especially for [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfloating-point conversions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`, `%E`, `%f`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Worst-case output lengths of `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` relative to the sizes of [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal buffers.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Behavior of `scpy` when copying from stack buffers to I/O buffers, and how it [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minterprets the length parameters.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between incremental writes in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` and the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero-termination logic.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Other format specifier handlers in `fmt.c` that may use similar fixed-size stack [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack overflow originates in mg_vxprintf’s `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c:~[0m[1;36m318[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIt declares a tiny local buffer `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mobject at stack offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthen calls  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which may write up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes into [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer, and  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which also writes into the same [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte region [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout null-terminating.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Even after patching the I/O sink [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the upstream buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow in fmt.c still occurs and propagates through scpy into the I/O buffer.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve Existing Logic  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must continue to:  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Format the mantissa using mg_dtoa with the requested precision,  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Emit the `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m` character,  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Format the decimal exponent via mg_lld,  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Write character-by-character through scpy to the iobuf.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other format specifiers, the floating‐point `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` logic, and the I/O [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexpansion in mg_pfn_iobuf_private remain untouched.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Proposal in src/fmt.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Replace the fixed-size [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte tmp with two adequately sized buffers:  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          char mant[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m buffer for mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign, digit, [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m, frac digits[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          char expbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m buffer for exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Format and emit the mantissa safely:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Pass full buffer length and requested precision[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t km = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa,[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                              pr >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? pr : [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mant, km[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Emit the `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m` character:  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. Format and emit the exponent safely:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t ke = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpbuf, exponent, true [0m[35m/[0m[39m*signed*[0m[35m/[0m[39m, false [0m[35m/[0m[39m*decimal*[0m[35m/[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m mg_lld does not null-terminate; scpy will copy exactly ke bytes[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, expbuf, ke[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   E. Close the branch as before:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* other cases unchanged *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Reapply and Preserve Other Patches  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Leave the improved bounds checks in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` untouched.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch continues to use `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m; [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exactly as before.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Splitting mantissa and exponent into dedicated buffers eliminates any [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpossibility of overlapping writes.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Buffer sizes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m64[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m comfortably exceed the worst‐case output lengths [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmantissa with precision up to, say, ~[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m digits plus sign and dot; exponent up to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m“[0m[1;36m-308[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` are called with explicit buffer sizes, preserving their[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternal truncation semantics.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `scpy` is passed the exact length returned by the formatting functions, so it [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcannot read past the end of either buffer.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No external or harness code is modified; all existing tests and fuzz [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentry‐points continue unchanged.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Side Effects & Mitigation  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The slight increase in stack usage [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≈[0m[1;36m80[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is negligible.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The mantissa buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m can be tuned downward if desired [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[1;36m48[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new dynamic allocations are introduced.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing formatting behavior and rounding semantics are preserved exactly.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Verification  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and rerun the libFuzzer+ASan harness.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that the stack‐buffer‐overflow no longer occurs and all format tests [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpass.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
